channel.title: Rsps'
channel.description:
So, I played one of those sponsored servers at the server status page, and I was wondering...
Do people nowadays really make such shit servers?

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I actually don’t care if they leech a server, but if they can’t go past the basic “change shops, done”, then it’s hopeless.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

frozon566:

i believe you misunderstood my post, i was attempting to say people that have payed for a sponsored serve slot (in my mind) are probably less likely to infect there clients.

This is to an extent, I’ll admit, there are rare cases as to people infecting their clients with a virus or of the sorts, but for the most part, it’s still likely.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:35, topic:439060”][quote author=frozon566 link=topic=541762.msg3970428#msg3970428 date=1334092729]
i don’t feel safe playing any non sponsored servers as much as this community (mopar/rl/r-s) has spoon fed people there launching all kinds of shit from the client, and its not that im naive enough to think sponsored server owner’s won’t do this, but it seems like there just less likely if they have paid money to advertise.
[/quote]
Not really, idiots will pay anything to feel better on servers.[/quote]

i believe you misunderstood my post, i was attempting to say people that have payed for a sponsored serve slot (in my mind) are probably less likely to infect there clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:32, topic:439060”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541762.msg3970291#msg3970291 date=1334086230]

Personally I don’t even think we should support sponsored servers. We are supposed to be one of the origins of rsps development yet we support having players leech a crap server and make money off of it themselves.

If I remember correctly, the money earned from the bids was supposed to be used to pay programmers for developing servers. Close to none of it has been paid out (I’m sure part of this is due to lack of development…)

You can literally create an awesome server that each player you get enjoys, but without having a sponsored spot you won’t cap 30 players. The sponsored servers make this site lack support for programmers to create something new and show it off.

I honestly hate the sponsored servers but I rarely ever scroll down to the non-sponsored servers.
I remember in the old days you could throw your server on there and within an hour have 60 players messing around.
[/quote]Sadly in todays time anyway your better off just going to R-L for adverts[/quote]
Sadly, you’re right.

Read full topic

Personally I don’t even think we should support sponsored servers. We are supposed to be one of the origins of rsps development yet we support having players leech a crap server and make money off of it themselves.

If I remember correctly, the money earned from the bids was supposed to be used to pay programmers for developing servers. Close to none of it has been paid out (I’m sure part of this is due to lack of development…)

You can literally create an awesome server that each player you get enjoys, but without having a sponsored spot you won’t cap 30 players. The sponsored servers make this site lack support for programmers to create something new and show it off.

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:28, topic:439060”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541762.msg3968993#msg3968993 date=1333995996]

yes for the most part servers are piles of turds, there are people who like to just find a source and start playing to be able to pk within a few minutes, but back a while ago i wanted to play a server for skilling/fun since i don’t enjoy pking much, and it blew my mind that simple things like Armour/weapon requirements are still half assed even by the sponsored servers ie zionscape or w/e its called.

There are some really well done and highly creative servers still in existence, emps-scape for example.
[/quote]“well done” nothing is well done about a java programmer who knows how to rip content from the rs deob.

“creative” nothing creative in emp scape name one server feature that is unique.

“well done” is relative, i.e can you do what emps-scape has done?

“creative” = not trying to “remake” runescape but instead taking it in there own directions with party hats emps-wars etc.[/quote]Could I remake what emps-scape has done, parts of it yes. I don’t claim to be a java programmer either though I joined this forum merely for the community to be honest.

emps-wars is pretty much the only thing that is “unique” and it’s a very old update at that.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:439060”][quote author=frozon566 link=topic=541762.msg3968952#msg3968952 date=1333993138]
yes for the most part servers are piles of turds, there are people who like to just find a source and start playing to be able to pk within a few minutes, but back a while ago i wanted to play a server for skilling/fun since i don’t enjoy pking much, and it blew my mind that simple things like Armour/weapon requirements are still half assed even by the sponsored servers ie zionscape or w/e its called.

There are some really well done and highly creative servers still in existence, emps-scape for example.
[/quote]“well done” nothing is well done about a java programmer who knows how to rip content from the rs deob.

“creative” nothing creative in emp scape name one server feature that is unique.[/quote]

“well done” is relative, i.e can you do what emps-scape has done?

“creative” = not trying to “remake” runescape but instead taking it in there own directions with party hats emps-wars etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

The sponsored server owners are only in it for money which is why their servers are shit and never updated… As long as they are making momey from idiots who donate they really don’t actually give a shit about their server or player base…

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps'
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:25, topic:439060”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541762.msg3969076#msg3969076 date=1334001664]

Guys… you have to be a wizard to get players. It isn’t about the quality of the server or the programming or the features, it’s about being a wizard.

nope. archer.

I’m a level 87 paladin.
[/quote]
Lel… One more level and my archer can use mithril arrows.[/quote]
Who cares? I gotz torva!

Read full topic
